content.raw:
Thank you @preyna ! I added a new issue: [CLOUD-94](https://osrfoundation.atlassian.net/browse/CLOUD-94), as it would be better to divide the PRs. It is currently blocked by this task, as there is no server status element yet, but I'm about to do the PR.

The screenshot of the Kiosk is the one in the [wiki](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/srcsim/wiki/cloud). Should we keep track of the changes and update these screenshots?
